Weeks<b3_0/> Bridge<a1_2/><a1_1/><a1_0/> is a pedestrian bridge over the Charles River connecting both campuses. <b7_0>The Harvard Medical School<b7_0/>, Harvard School of Dental Medicine, and the Harvard School of Public Health are located on a 21-acre (8.5 ha) campus in the <a2_0><a2_1><a2_2>Longwood Medical and Academic Area<a2_2/><a2_1/><a2_0/> approximately <b5_0>3.3 miles (5.3 km)<b5_0/> southwest of downtown Boston and <b6_0>3.3 miles (5.3 km)<b6_0/> south of the Cambridge campus.
